Action.Name: DlgComboBox.AddItem
Action.Description: Adds an item to a sorted combo box control. If the control is not sorted, the item will be added to the end.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the combo box control that you want to add an item to.

Arg.Name: ItemText
Arg.Description: The text of the item you want to add.

Action.Name: DlgComboBox.GetItemData
Action.Description: Gets the associated data string of an item in a combo box control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the combo box control whose item data you want.

Arg.Name: Index
Arg.Description: The index (line number) of the combo box item whose data you want. The first item in the list has an index of 1.

Action.Name: DlgComboBox.GetItemText
Action.Description: Returns the text of an item in a combo box control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the combo box control whose item text you want.

Arg.Name: Index
Arg.Description: The index (line number) of the combo box item whose text you want. The first item in the list has an index of 1.

Action.Name: DlgComboBox.GetProperties
Action.Description: Gets the properties of a combo box control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the combo box control whose properties you want.

Action.Name: DlgComboBox.InsertItem
Action.Description: Inserts an item into a combo box control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the combo box control you want to insert the item into.

Arg.Name: Index
Arg.Description: The index (line number) to insert the new item. Use an index of -1 to insert at the end of the list.

Arg.Name: ItemText
Arg.Description: The item text to display for the new item.

Action.Name: DlgComboBox.RemoveItem
Action.Description: Removes an item from a combo box control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the combo box control you want to remove an item from.

Arg.Name: Index
Arg.Description: The index (line number) of the item to remove from the combo box. The first item in the list has an index of 1. You can use an index of -1 to remove all items from the list.

Action.Name: DlgComboBox.SetItemData
Action.Description: Sets a combo box control's item data on the current screen to a string that can later be retrieved.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the combo box control whose item data you want to set.

Arg.Name: Index
Arg.Description: The index (line number) of the combo box item whose data you want to set. The first item in the list has an index of 1.

Arg.Name: ItemData
Arg.Description: The text you want to set the item's associated data to.

Action.Name: DlgComboBox.SetProperties
Action.Description: Sets the properties of a combo box control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the combo box control whose properties you want to set.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: A table containing the combo box control properties indexed by "Enabled", "Text" and "Visible".
